Player Command
==============

USAGE
   ``title [new title]``

without giving it a new title, shows you what your title is.
When you give it a new title, use $N for where you want your name to be.

For example:
  ``title $N rocks!``

And then when I type 'title' I see:
  ``Rust rocks!``

.. TAGS: RST
